# spatialmp

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of spatialmp is to predict spatial data using Bayesian Melding Method. The prediction is done SPDE and Integrated nested Laplace approximation. The data is assumed to be sampled from a latent Gaussian process. 

## Installation

You can install the development version of spatialmp from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("RuimanZhong/spatialmp")
```
